txt.en:
'The salmon have begun their yearly run. They are making their way up the rivers, from Edhellond to beyond Calembel, pushing to the White Mountains where they will spawn in the gravel shallows.

'Salmon make up a great deal of our foodstocks for the long winters. When they head up the rivers we must take advantage and catch as many as we can.

'Head north-east to Calembel, within Lamedon, and do your best to catch some salmon. You will need to stay on your toes, with the running they will not be in any one location for long. Look for where the fish are jumping and the water is rolling and disturbed.'
Salmon are making their way up the river from Edhellond to Calembel.
'This will serve to keep at least three families fed for a month when the cold strikes. I will be sure to mention your name when I bring the fish to them.'
Lamedon Salmon can be found north of Calembel in Lamedon in disturbed waters.\n\nTorchuil asked you to catch salmon to help stock the larders for the winter.
Torchuil is in Dol Amroth.\n\nTorchuil will be pleased to see the amount of salmon you have caught.
